altTitles.ja: ロンリーガールに花束を

altTitles.en: A Bouquet for the Lonely Girl

description.en:
A collection of one-shots written by Kashikaze, including some original content for Can't Defy the Lonely Girl.

Included chapters:
1. marking (https://mangadex.org/title/9cb600fb-c1a7-4116-913c-72002f634392/marking)
2. Kekkyoku Sonna Kimi ga Suki (https://mangadex.org/title/7984732d-5912-4a11-b42d-737ed5e6cb4c/kekkyoku-sonna-kimi-ga-suki)
3. Lonely Girl ni Sakaraenai more! (original)
4. Bukiyou na Aijou (original)
5. Shiranai Watashi mo Suki desu ka (https://mangadex.org/title/0a388cd0-6165-44a6-b352-3de5ea2bf5d5/shibuya-gal-yuri-anthology)
6. Watashi no Shiroi Bara (https://mangadex.org/title/38c8c836-3083-456e-8ca1-a3ba53ac352c/canele-soeur-yuri-anthology)
7. Renzu Goshi ni Oni wa Nai (https://mangadex.org/title/e8bdc7b1-3544-4fa6-b5a5-0903851f3722/renzu-goshi-ni-oni-wa-inai)
8. Hanaya no Ano Hito
9. Osake no Aji yori Amai Mono (https://mangadex.org/title/d8ee38bd-8054-4699-9090-2e58b7587bcc/alcohol-yuri-anthology-strong)
10. Osananajimi no Trophy (https://mangadex.org/title/30a46213-85cb-4e93-9f84-740677ddd7f5/jyoshikou-no-ouji-sama-ga-watashi-shika-ganchyuu-ni-nai-rashii-yuri-anthology-comic)
11. Futari de Hitotsu da kara (https://mangadex.org/title/2ba01ee0-5d82-4822-80ce-c7d1a579af01/private-life-is-theirs-alone-celebrity-x-yuri-anthology)
12. HItokoto Love Letter (https://mangadex.org/title/09ad07f8-4038-4ea1-af20-cdf8dff01244/tonari-no-seki-ga-sukina-hito-datta-gakusei-yuri-anthology)
